author: Cortex XSOAR

automation.description: Adds (or updates existing) rule in Forcepoint Triton. Preserves order of rules and modifies policy in-place if a rule exists with the exact type and value.
automation.name: FPSetRule

automation.description: Deletes a rule in Forcepoint Triton.
automation.name: FPDeleteRule

commands.description: Retrieve a list of all the categories, or only API-managed categories.
commands.name: fp-list-categories

commands.description: Get a list of URLs and IP addresses in an API-managed category.
commands.name: fp-get-category-detailes

commands.description: Add URLs and IP addresses to an API-managed category. Refer to category either by it's ID or by it's name.
commands.name: fp-add-address-to-category

commands.description: Delete API-managed categories. Refer to categories you wish to delete either by ID list or by name list. It is possible to pass both lists, when each list refers to different categories.
commands.name: fp-delete-categories

commands.description: Remove URLs, IP addresses, and ranges from a specific API-managed category.  Refer to category either by it's ID or by it's name.
commands.name: fp-delete-address-from-category

integration.description: Advanced threat protection with added local management controls.
integration.name: Forcepoint

description: Advanced threat protection with added local management controls.
name: Forcepoint
